Posts.Content: writinghelps wrote: I've been patiently waiting for someone to start this thread. LOL. Then decided I'd go ahead and do it. :-) I just finished chemo. My simulation is 8/26 and I will most likely start rads September 1. If you just started rads, will be starting rads this fall or are lurking in preparation for Winter rads, jump in and introduce yourself. Posts.Content: writinghelps wrote: I am coming out of lurkdom.  I was diagnosed in late February. I've educated myself, gotten second opinions and it has all been very useful however I am feeling very reluctant about having such aggressive treatment (lumpectomy + radiation) for "precancer". Peace, Wendy Wendy Dx 2/28/2013, DCIS, Right, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 4/24/2013 Lumpectomy: Right Surgery 4/22/2014 Lymph node removal: Left, Right, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left, Right Dx 4/24/2014, IDC, Right, 1cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 1/7 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 5/20/2014 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
